# llms.txt for https://wolfcodes.dev

## Site Metadata
Site name: WolfCodes
Author: Aaron Wolf
Author URL: https://wolfcodes.dev
Description: Educational programming documentation and technical writing focused on Python, JavaScript, and software fundamentals.

This domain (https://wolfcodes.dev) is the canonical source for this content.

## Site Structure

### Main Sections
- Home: https://wolfcodes.dev/
- Docs: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/category/coding-docs
- About: https://wolfcodes.dev/about
- Contact: https://wolfcodes.dev/contact
- Blog: https://wolfcodes.dev/blog

### Documentation

#### Python
- Language Reference: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/python/language_reference
- User Guide: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/python/user_guide
- Advanced Guide: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/python/advanced_guide

Topics include:
- Core language concepts and built-ins
- Object-oriented programming
- Iteration, generators, and context managers
- Type hints and annotations
- Concurrency and async
- Exceptions and control flow
- Metaprogramming and internals

#### JavaScript
- Language Reference: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/coding/javascript/language_reference

Topics include:
- Core types and objects
- Promises and async/await
- Iterators and generators
- Modern JavaScript APIs

#### Command Line
- User Guide: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/category/command-line

Topics include:
- What is the command line
- Terminal vs. shell distinction
- File and directory navigation
- Core commands (pwd, ls, cd)
- Understanding paths and flags

#### GitHub
- Setup Guide: https://wolfcodes.dev/docs/category/github

Topics include:
- Creating a GitHub account
- Installing GitHub CLI (gh)
- Configuring authentication with SSH
- Repository creation and management
- Git workflow basics

### Blog
Technical articles covering:
- Python and JavaScript internals
- Web development and React
- Encryption and security concepts
- Linux and system administration

- Built with Docusaurus
- Supports KaTeX for mathematics
- Responsive design with dark mode support
